mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.zuoye_tijiao_uuid_number as zuoyeTijiaoUuidNumber ,a.zuoye_id as zuoyeId ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.zuoye_tijiao_text as zuoyeTijiaoText ,a.zuoye_shangchuan_file as zuoyeShangchuanFile ,a.zuoye_tijiao_yesno_types as zuoyeTijiaoYesnoTypes ,a.zuoye_tijiao_pigai as zuoyeTijiaoPigai ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number as laoshiUuidNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,zuoye.laoshi_id as zuoyeLaoshiId ,zuoye.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,zuoye.zuoye_address as zuoyeAddress ,zuoye.zuoye_photo as zuoyePhoto ,zuoye.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes ,zuoye.zuoye_video as zuoyeVideo ,zuoye.zuoye_file as zuoyeFile ,zuoye.zuoye_content as zuoyeContent ,zuoye.zuoye_delete as zuoyeDelete
FROM zuoye_tijiao a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN zuoye zuoye ON a.zuoye_id = zuoye.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.zuoye_tijiao_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeTijiaoUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.zuoye_id = #{params.zuoyeId} )
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} or zuoye.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.zuoye_tijiao_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeTijiaoText},'%')
and a.zuoye_tijiao_yesno_types = #{params.zuoyeTijiaoYesnoTypes}
and a.zuoye_tijiao_pigai >= #{params.zuoyeTijiaoPigaiStart}
and a.zuoye_tijiao_pigai <= #{params.zuoyeTijiaoPigaiEnd}
and a.zuoye_tijiao_pigai = #{params.zuoyeTijiaoPigai}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.zuoye_id IS NOT NULL
and zuoye.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeAddress},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and zuoye.zuoye_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeVideo},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
and zuoye.zuoye_delete >= #{params.zuoyeDeleteStart}
and zuoye.zuoye_delete <= #{params.zuoyeDeleteEnd}
and zuoye.zuoye_delete = #{params.zuoyeDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(zuoye.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
